thread.title: Big time boxing coming to Glendale
thread.title_full: Big time boxing coming to Glendale

title: Big time boxing coming to Glendale
text:
Big time boxing coming to Glendale Boxing fans will flock to Glendale on Wednesday for a full slate of boxing action. Post to Facebook Big time boxing coming to Glendale Boxing fans will flock to Glendale on Wednesday for a full slate of boxing action.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1LroTNH   Join the Conversation To   Big time boxing coming to Glendale Robby Baker , 12 Sports 5:07 p.m. MST October 12, 2015 Devon Alexander and Aron Martinez discuss their fight KPNX Boxing fans will flock to Glendale on Wednesday for a full slate of boxing action. Devon Alexander will fight Aron Martinez Wednesday in Arizona. (Photo: 12 Sports) CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Boxing fans rejoice, major boxing action is heading to Glendale and Gila River Arena this week. 
Lee Selby will put his Featherweight World Title on the line as he faces off against Fernando Montiel while Devon Alexander is out to prove his doubters wrong as he takes on Aron Martinez. 
ESPN Premier Boxing is set to take over Gila River Arena on Wednesday, with the Alexander vs. Martinez bout highlighting the card. 
There is plenty of intruigue in the Selby vs. Montiel matchup though, as it will be Selby's first fight on U.S. soil and his first title defense. Lee Selby talks defending his featherweight title KPNX Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1LroTNH TOP VIDEOS
